page-onboarding.intro: Sidd Dir prett fir Äert Heem interessant ze maachen, Är Privatsphär ze garantéieren an enger weltwäiter Gemeinschaft bei ze trieden?

user.intro: Looss eis ufänken andeems en e Benotzerkont erstellt.

helper.password: Choose a strong and unique password. Make sure to save it, so you don't forget it.

core-config.intro_location: Mir wëlle wësse wou dir wunnt. Dës Informatioun ass néideg fir Informatiounen unzeweisen an Automatiséierungen anzeriichten, déi op der Sonn baséieren. Dës Donnéeë ginn nimools ausserhalb vun ärem Netzwierk gedeelt.
core-config.title_location_detect: Wëlls de, dass mer däi Standuert ermëttelen?
core-config.intro_location_detect: Mir kënne beim Ausfëlle vun dësen Informatiounen hëllefen andeems eng eemoleg Demande bei engem externe Service ugefrot gëtt.
core-config.country_intro: We would like to know the country your home is in, so we can use the correct units for you.
core-config.location_name: Numm vun denger Home Assistant Installatioun

integration.intro: These are found on your local network. Some are already added, others may need extra configuration.

base.title: Basic analytics
base.description: This includes information about your system.

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: Details of what you use with NDX Tech

statistics.title: Statistical data
statistics.description: Counts containing total number of datapoints.

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.

analytics.need_base_enabled: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make NDX Tech better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.

restore.name: Backup name
restore.confirm_restore_partial_backup_text: The backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min.
restore.confirm_restore_full_backup_text: Your entire system will be wiped and the backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min.
